Relation_ID, FType, Change_Duty, Change_Description, CC, Change_Date, Attachment, Change_ID, FRelation_ID
mapper.update:
update
set Relation_ID = #{Relation_ID}, FType = #{FType}, Change_Duty = #{Change_Duty}, Change_Description = #{Change_Description}, CC = #{CC}, Change_Date = #{Change_Date}, Attachment = #{Attachment}, FRelation_ID=#{FRelation_ID}, Change_ID = Change_ID where Change_ID = #{Change_ID}
mapper.select: select ,ca.Cabinet_Type,f1.Cabinet_No from f left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f1 on f.FRelation_ID=f1.Cabinet_Assembly_Detail_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ca on ca.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f1.Cabinet_Assembly_ID where f.Change_ID = #{Change_ID}

and ( Change_Duty LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or Change_Description LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.Cabinet_No LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or ca.Cabinet_Type LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
